data.title: 5 must-watch Tigmanshu Dhulia-directed films
data.meta_description: Tigmanshu Dhulia is celebrating his 57th birthday today. While you must have seen him in some critically acclaimed films and shows, check out this list of 5 must-watch films directed by him.
data.text:
Tigmanshu Dhulia is celebrating his birthday today, July 3. The director, who has also acted in several films, is an artist par excellence. On this special day, check out 5 of his must-watch films.

This biographical film stars Irrfan Khan as the titular character, an athlete who becomes a notorious bandit. The movie received critical acclaim and won the National Film Award for Best Feature Film.

A romantic thriller set against the backdrop of student politics in Allahabad, featuring Jimmy Shergill and Hrishitaa Bhatt. The film is known for its realistic portrayal of college politics and compelling storytelling.

A gripping crime drama featuring Jimmy Shergill, Mahie Gill, and Randeep Hooda. The film was well-received and led to two sequels, also directed by Dhulia.

The sequel to "Saheb, Biwi Aur Gangster," continuing the story with new twists and turns. It stars Jimmy Shergill, Mahie Gill, and Irrfan Khan.
